```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(RColorBrewer)
```

```{r}
domains = c("red", "blue", "red", "magenta", "blue", "green", "blue", "red", "black")
human_proteins = rep(brewer.pal(2, "Set3"), c(4,5))
{
plot(rep(1,9), 9:1, col = domains, pch=19, cex=5, ylim=c(0,10), xlim =c(1,10))
for(i in 1:9){
    segments(x0 = 1.5, y0 = i, x1 = 4.5, y1 = i, col = human_proteins[i], lwd=20)
}
}
```
